name.ja: スライスマスターアンブロックされました™
name.th: มาสเตอร์ของการตัดและเจาะทะลุ™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Slice Master Unblocked™ as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.es: Juega a Slice Master Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängige Slice Master Unblocked™ Chrome'i laiendusena - saab mängida ka ilma internetiühenduseta, proovige kohe!
short.fi: Pelaa Slice Master Unblocked™ Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Slice Master Unblocked™ bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari ring laruin nang walang internet, subukan ito ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Slice Master Unblocked™ en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez maintenant !
short.he: Juega a Slice Master Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Jogue Slice Master Desbloqueado™ como uma extensão do Chrome - Também é possível jogar sem internet, experimente agora!
short.id: Juega Slice Master Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.it: Gioca a Slice Master Unblocked™ come estensione Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza Internet, provalo ora!
short.ja: 「Slice Master Unblocked™」をChrome拡張機能としてプレイしてみてください。インターネット接続なしでもプレイできます。
short.lt: Play Slice Master Unblocked™ as a Chrome extension - Also can play without internet, try it now!
short.ms: Juega Slice Master Desbloqueado™ como una extensión de Chrome - También se puede jugar sin Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.nl: Speel Slice Master Unblocked™ als een Chrome-extensie - Ook speelbaar zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega Slice Master Unblocked™ como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También se puede jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.ru: Играйте в Slice Master Unblocked™ как расширение для Chrome - также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte Slice Master Unblocked™ kot razširitev Chrome - Lahko igrate tudi brez interneta, poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Igrajte Slice Master Unblocked™ kao Chrome ekstenziju - Takođe možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.tr: Chrome uzantısı olarak Slice Master Unblocked™ oynayın - Ayrıca İnternetsiz oynayabilirsiniz, şimdi deneyin!
short.vi: Chơi Slice Master Unblocked™ dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần kết nối Internet, hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序玩切片大师未封锁™ - 也可以在没有互联网的情况下玩，现在试试吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press Space or Left-click to flip the knife and jump in Slice Master. Overcome everything in your path... Except for pink obstacles. The more objects you cut, the higher your score!

At the end of each level, try to hit the target to maximize your bonus. Addition and multiplication give you the most points. Avoid subtraction and division, as they will significantly reduce your score.

Achieve BONUS goals to unlock bonus levels! In these bonus rounds, players will surpass targets to receive a higher amount of coins than usual. Make sure you stay focused during these bonus rounds; they are a great opportunity to make real progress in the game.

Continue slicing through targets and collecting coins to unlock every version of the knife. Can you unlock all nine knife skins and become a certified Slice Master?

🔪🚀 Press Space or Left-click to flip the knife and jump!
🎯🏆 Hit the target at the end of each level for a bonus!
➕✖️ Addition and multiplication give you the most points!
➖➗ Avoid subtraction and division to maintain a high score!
🎉🔓 Achieve BONUS goals to unlock special levels!
💰💎 Collect coins to unlock all nine knife skins!
👀🎯 Can you become a certified Slice Master?

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
